titles.title: Preventing a Government Shutdown Act
A bill to prevent the shutdown of the Federal Government.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S2336-2337)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Appropriations.

bill.summary: 4/8/2011--Introduced. Preventing a Government Shutdown Act - Provides for automatic continuing appropriations if a regular appropriation bill for a fiscal year (or if applicable, for each fiscal year in a biennium) does not become law or a joint resolution making continuing appropriations is not in effect.
